mapper.select: select public_notice_no, pubntc_title, pubntc_content , pubntc_date from public_notices order by public_notice_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into public_notices (public_notice_no, pubntc_title, pubntc_content, pubntc_date) values (attendance.public_notice_no_seq.nextval, #{pubntcTitle} ,#{pubntcContent}, #{pubntcDate})
